githapi 0.10.1
  • Reference
  • Release Notes

User-friendly access to the GitHub API for R, consistent with the tidyverse

Source: R/githapi-package.R
githapi.Rd

Provides a suite of functions which simplify working with GitHub's API. The functions have a consistent API and return either lists for single entities and tibbles for collections.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/ChadGoymer/githapi

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/ChadGoymer/githapi/issues
